name: The Sharp FP-A60UW Dual-Action Plasmacluster Air Purifier with HEPA Filter captures 99.97% of particles as small as 0.3
categoryPath: Home Improvement/Heating, Cooling, & Air Quality/Air Purifiers

reviews.name: Sharp FP-A60UW Plasmacluster Air Purifier with HEPA Filter
reviews.reviewText:
It will help keep you healthy. I had 3 Sharp air purifier sitting at various location in the house. The previous one that I bought, has been kept on 24/7 for the past 5 year without any defect or issue. A model like this one use to costs much higher. Now it is much more affordable. There is a lower Sharp air purifier model available, but the saving isn't worth the value & quality you get.

This model requires filter change every 6 months. The new developed filter works well capturing odors & dusts. So it is worth it because it helps keeping air you breath at optimum level.
reviews.title: Packed with well developed technology from Japan.

reviews.name: Sharp FP-A60UW Plasmacluster Air Purifier with HEPA Filter
reviews.reviewText: It works as advertised. The air purifier has three speeds, the lowest speed is very, very quiet. At lowest speed, the air in the room (about 350 sq ft) was clean within 24 hours. I've only had it for about 3 weeks so I can't comment on it's long term operation. So far it's great.
reviews.title: So far, the air purifier has worked as advertized.

reviews.name: Sharp FP-A60UW Plasmacluster Air Purifier with HEPA Filter
reviews.reviewText: I have just had this for a short time but, what a job it is doing so far !!! I am home most of the time. I smoke 3 packs a day and I have friends over that smoke as well. You no longer smell that in my home,for real ! I'm not kidding you. Now I may have to buy filters more but I don't care as long as it keeps up the good work. Now I did how ever wash my walls down and had the rugs cleaned so I would have a clean place for it to do the job. But now I can say,no more smell!!! Well, I got to run ! I need a smoke !!! Hay, get it ! You'll love it !!!
reviews.title: It gets the job done !!!

reviews.name: Sharp FP-A60UW Plasmacluster Air Purifier with HEPA Filter
reviews.reviewText: The purifier does a great job of cleaning the air. It is very quiet, except on high. There is a light that can no be turned off, but I decided breathing more easily was better than complete darkness.
reviews.title: Great aid purifier

reviews.name: Sharp FP-A60UW Plasmacluster Air Purifier with HEPA Filter
reviews.reviewText:
I use this Sharp in my bedroom and it keeps the air fresh and pure. Before I purchased this unit I had a problem breathing the stale air, we keep our bedroom door closed to
eliminate any noise from my many grandfather clocks. This unit is ultra quite on the
low setting which is great for a bedroom while you sleep.
reviews.title: Clean Air By Sharp
